title: Letâ€™s go to a ball game
content: Tickets for Chino and Chino Hills Night at Angel Stadium on Thursday, June 21 are on sale through the Chino Valley Chamber of Commerce.    The 7:05 p.m. game will feature the Blue Jays versus the Angels.     Subscription Required   An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety.
